```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(flextable)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#set up the file path
file.path=file.path(here::here(),
          "data",
          "userp_wallkill.csv")

file.path2=file.path(here::here(),
          "data",
          "sites_wallkill.csv")

```

```{r include=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#read in the data
UserP_all<-read.csv(file.path,stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
Sites<-read.csv(file.path2,stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r include=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#function to make the sites a factor in order from upstream to downstream
order_sites<-function(df, sites_table, df_site_col, sites_site_col){
Sites<-sites_table%>%
  rename(SITE_ID=sites_site_col)

df<-df%>%
  rename(SITE_ID=df_site_col)

all_data<-left_join(df, Sites, by="SITE_ID")
all_data<-all_data%>%
  arrange(order)%>%
  mutate(SITE_ID=factor(SITE_ID, levels = unique(SITE_ID)))%>%
  select(-c(order:UPDATED_BY_GUID))
}
```


```{r include=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#function to create mean primary and secondary rankings graph
#first convert letters to scores and move data to long format
userp_contact_fig<-function(df, sites_table, bar.width, ...){
contact<-df%>%
  mutate(Primary=ifelse(UPFDH_PRIMARY_CONTACT=="A", yes=1, no=ifelse(UPFDH_PRIMARY_CONTACT=="B", yes=2, no=ifelse(UPFDH_PRIMARY_CONTACT=="C", yes=3, no=ifelse(UPFDH_PRIMARY_CONTACT=="D", yes=4, no=ifelse(UPFDH_PRIMARY_CONTACT=="E", yes=5, no=ifelse(UPFDH_PRIMARY_CONTACT=="F", yes=6, no=NA)))))),
         Secondary=ifelse(UPFDH_SECONDARY_CONTACT=="A", yes=1, no=ifelse(UPFDH_SECONDARY_CONTACT=="B", yes=2, no=ifelse(UPFDH_SECONDARY_CONTACT=="C", yes=3, no=ifelse(UPFDH_SECONDARY_CONTACT=="D", yes=4, no=ifelse(UPFDH_SECONDARY_CONTACT=="E", yes=5, no=ifelse(UPFDH_SECONDARY_CONTACT=="F", yes=6, no=NA)))))))%>%
  select(SITE_ID, Primary, Secondary)%>%
  pivot_longer(-SITE_ID, names_to = "Contact Type", values_to = "value")%>%
  order_sites(sites_table, sites_site_col = "SH_SITE_ID", df_site_col = "SITE_ID")



#second build plot
plot<-ggplot(contact, aes(x=SITE_ID, y=value, fill=`Contact Type`))+
  geom_bar(position="dodge", width=0.7, na.rm = TRUE, stat = "summary", fun.y = "mean")+
  ylab("Mean Observer Ranking")+
  xlab("Location ID")+
  ylim(0,6)+
  scale_fill_grey()+
  theme_pander() +
      theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60, hjust = 1))+
      theme(legend.position="right")

print(plot)
}
```

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=5,fig.width=7.5,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
userp_contact_fig(UserP_all, Sites, bar.width = 0.7)
```

```{r include=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#create table of mean scores for Variables influencing recreation
userp_variables_table<-function(df, sites_table){
Variables<-df%>%
  group_by(SITE_ID)%>%
  summarize(`Water Clarity`=round(mean(UPFDH_WATER_CLARITY, na.rm = TRUE), digits=0),
            `Suspended Phytoplankton`= round(mean(UPFDH_SUSP_PHYTOPLANKTON, na.rm = TRUE),digits=0),
            Periphyton= round(mean(UPFDH_PERIPHYTON, na.rm = TRUE), digits=0),
            Macrophyte= round(mean(UPFDH_MACROPHYTE, na.rm = TRUE), digits=0),
            Odor=round(mean(UPFDH_ODOR, na.rm=TRUE), digits=0),
            Trash= round(mean(UPFDH_TRASH, na.rm = TRUE), digits=0),
            `Discharge Pipes`= round(mean(UPFDH_DISCHARGE_PIPE, na.rm = TRUE), digits=0))%>%
  order_sites(sites_table, sites_site_col = "SH_SITE_ID", df_site_col = "SITE_ID")

final_table<-flextable(Variables)%>%
  theme_zebra()%>%
  set_header_labels(SITE_ID="Site \n ID", `Water Clarity`="Water \n Clarity", `Suspended Phytoplankton`="Suspended \nPhytoplankton", Periphyton="Periphyton", Odor="Odor", Trash="Trash", `Discharge Pipes`= "Dishcarge \n Pipes")%>%
  align(j=2:8, align="center", part="all")%>%
  font(fontname = "Arial", part="all")%>%
  fontsize(size=10, part="all")%>%
  width(j = c(2,4,8), width = 0.8)%>%
  width(j = c(3,5), width = 1.1)%>%
  width(j=1, width=1.1)
final_table
}  
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
userp_variables_table(UserP_all, Sites)
```

```{r include=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
# function for table of Dominant Factor influencing recreation
userp_dominant_variable_table<-function(df, site_table, fontsize){
DominantP<-UserP_all%>%
  filter(UPFDH_PRIMARY_VARIABLE!="")%>%
group_by(SITE_ID, UPFDH_PRIMARY_VARIABLE)%>%
  count()%>%
  group_by(SITE_ID)%>%
  filter(n == max(n))%>%
  group_by(SITE_ID)%>%
  summarize(Primary=paste0(UPFDH_PRIMARY_VARIABLE, collapse = ", "))
  
DominantS<-UserP_all%>%
  filter(UPFDH_SECONDARY_VARIABLE!="")%>%
group_by(SITE_ID, UPFDH_SECONDARY_VARIABLE)%>%
  count()%>%
  group_by(SITE_ID)%>%
  filter(n == max(n))%>%
  group_by(SITE_ID)%>%
  summarize(Secondary=paste0(UPFDH_SECONDARY_VARIABLE, collapse=", "))

Dominant<-left_join(DominantP, DominantS, by="SITE_ID")%>%
  order_sites(sites_table=Sites, sites_site_col = "SH_SITE_ID", df_site_col = "SITE_ID")

final_table<-flextable(Dominant)%>%
  theme_zebra()%>%
  align(j=1:3, align="left", part="all")%>%
  fontsize(size = fontsize, part = "body")%>%
  font(fontname = "Arial", part="all")%>%
  autofit()

final_table
}
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
userp_dominant_variable_table(UserP_all, Sites, fontsize = 10)
```
